TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the Kommunity Jool ship does work, but I got to grant a wish.

 

I wish Dres the worst of luck. Seriously. Dres sucks.

Granted, but since a meteor blows it apart, your standing on it as you incurred the wrath of the almighty Kraken for insulting Dres.

 

 

I wish [INSERT HERE].

granted, [INSERT HERE] 

i wish people would stop insulting Dres.

Granted, on the condition that nobody praises it.

I wish my math teacher accepted "I input it into my calculator" as work. I mean, that's all I did, so anything else would be a lie.

Granted. Except I'm not your math teacher. 

I wish I would stop smashing Jebsey station in the process of assembling imagination class interplanetary ships.

Granted, KSP won't load ever again so you won't ever smash it.

I wish my computer would load 1.1 properly.

Granted, as long as I can download 1.1 and also load it properly. 

I wish over posting was encouraged.
Granted, but you are banned from the forums...
*sigh* i wish people would always post a wish in the forum to keep the game going.

Whoops, sorry! 

I wish for infinite bacon.

Granted, go play PvZ. 

I wish for less lag.

Granted, all your video games stop lagging, but real life now suffers from extreme lag!

 

I wish moderator's were more strict on overposting.

Not granted, There's no rule saying anything! 

I wish dolphin would stop ruining my wishes.

Granted, no more wishes for you.

I wish half of my thirty notifications per hour weren't max_creative posts.

Edited April 21, 2016 by Andem

1 hour ago, Andem said:

Granted, no more wishes for you.

I wish half of my thirty notifications per hour weren't max_creative posts.

Sorry. Not granted. Maybe. 

I wish people complained less.

Granted. If you stop overposting, then we wouldn't complain.

I wish that max_creative would NOT reply to this post so we could have some posts that aren't related to his extreme overposting!

Wish granted, but it ended up being me instead.

 

I wish Max Creative would just admit that the only reason he likes Dres is because everyone else hates it.

Edited April 21, 2016 by EliasDanger

Granted, your right. And it's great for refueling, is the ultimate rover place, has dresteriods, and had an awesome canyon! 

I wish people would stop making wishes about me.

Granted, you are banned from the forums, now your extreme over-posting is no longer a problem!
 

I wish max_creative stopped overposting.

Granted, but it's a different guy. I continue over posting. 

I wish I didn't have homework today.

Granted, but the other humans are convinced you cheated to get out of homework and they beat you up.

I wish @max_creative would explain how it's even possible he has this many posts already.

Granted, the answer is I don't like school. 

I wish people would stop making wishes about me.

Granted, oh wait...

 

I wish @max_creative stopped ruining the forum games by posting every other comment, the emotion you're supposed to feel on the KSP forums, especially in the forums games, is Kerbal-y happiness, not frustration.

Granted, oh wait... 

Sorry. Although if you don't want me to come then don't mention me because I have it set to make a really load noise. 

I wish that people pretended this post never existed.

efignagna afagnagna un fougnon , well look like you don't understand that language, but it don't exist anyway

i wish you couldn't explain better why you'r camping the subforum

Edited April 22, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
